sentences.en: a medical student
sentences.cn: 医科学生

sentences.en: a patient’s medical history
sentences.cn: 患者的病史

sentences.en: Ann Bradley dispels the old wives' tales and gives the medical facts.
sentences.cn: 安·布拉德利破除迷信，给出了医学事实。

sentences.en: Any dog bite, no matter how small, needs immediate medical attention.
sentences.cn: 被狗咬后，不管伤口多小，都必须立即就医。

sentences.en: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question.
sentences.cn: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

sentences.en: It could inhibit the poor from getting the medical care they need.
sentences.cn: 那会使穷人得不到他们所需要的医疗保健。

sentences.en: Medical authorities were baffled, both as to its causes and its virulence.
sentences.cn: 医疗当局对其病因及有多致命都还不甚了解。

sentences.en: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.
sentences.cn: 医生对于服用多少药片算作过量意见不一。

sentences.en: medical or surgical treatment
sentences.cn: 内科或外科疗法

sentences.en: medical research
sentences.cn: 医学研究

sentences.en: medical staff
sentences.cn: 医务人员

sentences.en: Medical tests established that she was not their own child.
sentences.cn: 医学化验证实她不是他们的亲骨肉。

sentences.en: Only now have doctors, and allied medical professionals, come to appreciate this.
sentences.cn: 直到现在医生和相关医学人士才开始对此有所认识。

sentences.en: She is demanding reimbursement for medical and other expenses.
sentences.cn: 她正在索赔医药费和其他花费。

sentences.en: The attitude of the medical profession is very much more liberal now.
sentences.cn: 现在，医务人员的态度开明多了。

sentences.en: The extremists entered the building disguised as medical workers.
sentences.cn: 极端分子伪装成医务工作者进入了大楼。

sentences.en: The first plane-loads of food, children's clothing and medical supplies began arriving.
sentences.cn: 首批飞机运送的食物、儿童衣物和药品开始抵达。

sentences.en: The medical board would not pass him fit for General Service.
sentences.cn: 医疗卫生委员会不会批准他为全科医生。

sentences.en: The problem is compounded by the medical system here.
sentences.cn: 这儿的医疗体制使问题进一步恶化。

sentences.en: Uninsured people can be bankrupted by big medical bills.
sentences.cn: 高额的医疗费会让未参保者变得倾家荡产。

words.tran_cn: 有药效的；可治病的；有治疗作用的
医师；医科学生；苜蓿属植物（等于medick）
药物；药物治疗；药物处理
医学的,医术的,医疗的,内科的

phrases.tran_cn: 医疗设备；医疗器材；人体医疗配件
医学技术，医疗技术；医学检验

trans.tran_en: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury
an examination of your body by a doctor to see if you are healthy
